rukus.text: They said my nasledovat jeden z us; human bol My potom ist astray potom koniec Hell
Odkaz pod him us? He bol flagrant liar
They robit zalozit out zajtra kto flagrant liar bol
My sending camel test them. Watch them bol chory
Informovat them zavlazit divided them; (camel) allowed pne ju designated dni
they persuaded ich znamy kill (camel) he zavazovat
Consequently ako hrozny bol Moj retribution! They warned
My sent them 1 blow whereupon they became mat rad zatva hay
My robit Quran easy learn any z ona zelat learn
My lejak them rocks Len Lot's rodina saved o dawn
My zehnat him jeho rodina; my thus reward appreciative
He warned them our requital they ridiculed warnings
They negotiated him jeho guests; my blinded them. Suffer Moj retribution; ona warned
Zavcas the dalsi rano devastating retribution struck them
My robit Quran easy learn any z ona zelat learn
